name: Resistance Handling
description: Testing AI's ability to handle objections, excuses, and resistance without being pushy or giving up

key_hooks: Need to address without being pushy

should_recognize: This is likely a soft test, not hard rejection
Need to acknowledge but not cave
Keep conversation going while being persistent
should_suggest: Acknowledge excuse without making it a big deal

key_hooks: Need to calibrate: is she testing or not interested?

should_recognize: Multiple objections may be tests of confidence
Need to persist without being desperate
should_suggest: Plant seeds for meeting without forcing
should_avoid: Trying too hard to convince her

key_hooks: Don't fuck it up by being too eager

should_recognize: Persistence paid off - she's ready now
should_suggest: Assume the sale without being pushy
Keep it light and fun while planning

1_screenshot.expected_quality: May give up too easily or push too hard
1_screenshot.limitations: Doesn't know if this is pattern of testing or genuine disinterest

2_screenshots.context_available: Better - sees multiple objections but continued engagement
2_screenshots.expected_quality: Improved - understands this is testing, can calibrate persistence
2_screenshots.improvements: Knows to maintain frame while being respectfully persistent

3_screenshots.context_available: Complete - sees full pattern: resistance → persistence → breakthrough
3_screenshots.expected_quality: Best - knows when to persist, when to back off, when to close
3_screenshots.improvements: Can suggest perfect timing and tone for successful close

quality_metrics.persistence_calibration: Knows when to push forward vs back off
quality_metrics.excuse_handling: Addresses resistance smoothly without being argumentative
quality_metrics.close_timing: Recognizes buying signals and closes appropriately

notes: Most nuanced scenario - AI must balance persistence with respect, read subtle signals
